Uses of Class
ej.microui.Model

Packages that use Model
ej.microui   
ej.microui.io   
 

Uses of Model in ej.microui
 

Subclasses of Model in ej.microui
 class IntHolder
          An IntHolder is a generic model that wraps one signed 32-bit int.
 class ObjectHolder
          An ObjectHolder is a generic model that wraps one object and notifies its listeners with the method changed(int, Object), passing 0 and the new object as arguments, when the wrapped object is replaced by another one.
 

Uses of Model in ej.microui.io

          Get the View's model.
 

Methods in ej.microui.io with parameters of type Model
 void View.setModel(Model model)
          Sets the view's model.
